TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed JSVsaItemType extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

Docs.summary: Represents the type of the item.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType AppGlobal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Used to add a global object to the .NET script engine. This type is used to create an IJSVsaGlobalItem object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType Code = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Used to create a code item for storing source code for the .NET script engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.JSVsaItemType Reference = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Used to add a reference to an external .NET assembly, which can then be referenced from code. This type is used to create an IJSVsaReferenceItem object
